definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Commitment to animal welfare issues and to promoting IFAW's mission.
sentences.chinese: 理解动物福利理念，并愿意推动IFAW宗旨。

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推动全世界的改装奔驰车。

sentences.english: It's a classic case of cost-push inflation.
sentences.chinese: 这是典型的成本推动的通货膨胀。

sentences.english: I don't like too much plot , because I prefer things to be character-driven.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢过多的情节，因为我喜欢由人物推动的故事。

sentences.english: Alleviating air traffic congestion is one of the major goals of the new push into high-speed rail.
sentences.chinese: 推动高铁发展的主要目的，就是缓解空中交通的拥挤。

sentences.english: Driven by the new technology revolution, economic globalization has picked up speed.
sentences.chinese: 在新技术革命的推动下，经济全球化进程加快。

sentences.english: Both line managers and employees have the responsibility to promote a half-year review.
sentences.chinese: 直线经理和员工都有责任推动年中审核。

sentences.english: The arrival of Princess Wen Cheng and promote Tibetan culture, the integration of clothing with the Central Plains.
sentences.chinese: 文成公主的到来，推动了藏族服饰同中原文化的融合。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推动液压油从而驱动发电机运转。

sentences.english: We regard scientific research as the first driving force of the reform and development of education.
sentences.chinese: 学校把教科研工作作为教育改革与发展的第一推动力。

sentences.english: The launch of the iPad in 2010 triggered a new round of innovation in the startup community.
sentences.chinese: 2010年iPad的问市推动了新一轮的创新浪潮。

sentences.english: A gasoline engine drives the motorboat.
Therefore, neoteric peasant movements are the major impetus of Chinas earlier modernization.
sentences.chinese: 因此，近代农民运动是中国早期现代化的主要推动力。

sentences.english: An airplane with such an engine.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮喷气发动机推动的飞机。
这项发明革命性地推动了眼科学的发展。

sentences.english: First, the government should allocate resources for promoting economic development.
sentences.chinese: 首先，预算案须拨出资源推动经济发展。

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to bolster/to give a boost to (the economy etc)
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
